attributes.action: NHS to provide FAI Hip Impingement Surgery Nationwide
attributes.additional_details:
Currently only some PCTS will grant authorization for hip arthroscopy surgery for NHS patients.

For example if you live in Doncaster you can get surgery but if you live in Lincolnshire you can't get funding.

This is Discriminatory against those suffering from this incredible painful and debilitating condition who are being denied treatment/funding.

This discrimination must stop, treatment must be available nationwide.
